title: Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
OB: In the package view outline, when double-clicking on a type import statement, the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
EB: In the package view outline, when double-clicking on a type import statement, the editor should open on the unit hosting the import reference, not the target type.
SR: Ensure that double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline opens the editor on the unit hosting the import reference.
